name: Black Cleaver
passive: Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack for 6 seconds (max 6 stacks). Each stack reduces the target's Armor by 5%.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Ability Haste, Ability Haste, Movement Speed. Passive effect: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack for 6 seconds (max 6 stacks). Each stack reduces the target's Armor by 5%.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great against teams with multiple tanks or bruisers
The armor shred benefits your entire team's physical damage
Stack the effect quickly with multi-hit abilities
Perfect for bruisers who deal sustained physical damage
Synergizes well with other armor penetration items
